description:
### Candies

A function that calculates how many candies will be equally distributed amongst n children, given that m candies are available. If there are some candies left after equal distribution, these candies will not be used.

Input: Two integers: n (number of children) and m (number of candies).
Output: The maximum amount of candies that can be equally distributed.

Example:

```js candies(3,10) // 9 ```
